}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/NDD9578221607 NDD9578221607] (2016-12-29) :Model: [[Edimax EW-7822UNC|EW-7822UNC]], EW-7822ULC *"EW-7822UNC" and "P/C=F119-223" is silkscreened on the board (top). *"1246-00000172-50Z" and "1637" is silkscreened on the board (bottom). {{see also|Edimax|Edimax EW-7822UNC}}
